author: dreid
msg: BeOS threads can exit in strange orders, even in testthread they will often
exit in an order different from that they were started in, so store the thread
exitval and if we miss the death of a thread when calling thread_join we return

author: wrowe
msg: Introduce the apr_pool_userdata_setn() variant that doesn't strdup the key.
Support for passing NULL as the cleanup callback, so items that don't
require a cleanup need not incur the overhead of registering a no-op.

author: striker
msg: Remove it after buildconf, or when someone runs autoconf
manually, remove it on make clean.

author: dreid
msg: Some more tidying up for the beos code and get it building again.

author: dreid
msg: Add the actual code for most of the new lock methods.  Just the conditional
implementation to add at some point.
